channel.title: Client Compiler Help
channel.description:
I get this: error javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
Not sure what its telling me :P im a little noob with this kind of stuff anything would help. I have the javac file and i have jdk.1.6.0_23.. if that matters.
Thanks in Advance, Brandon

item.title: Client Compiler Help

item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

Your classpath is messed up, post your base and compile path here and i’ll take a look.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Compiler Help

item.description:

I get this:
error javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

Not sure what its telling me im a little noob with this kind of stuff anything would help.
I have the javac file and i have jdk.1.6.0_23… if that matters.

Thanks in Advance,
Brandon
